seo.title: Tina Cloud
seo.description: Tina Cloud is a content management platform composed of an open-source editing UI and a backend powered by GraphQL and Git.

blocks.headline: Ship Great Content, Faster
blocks.subline: Tina Cloud is a Headless CMS Backed by Git

items.headline: Collaborate With the Team
items.subline: Onboard your team; no GitHub accounts required.  Tina Cloud brings user-management, auth, roles, and a GraphQL API for your content.

items.headline: Move Faster With Tina Cloud
items.subline: Visual editing + Git storage allows you to ship content faster with the safety of version-control.

items.headline: GraphQL API
items.subline: The Tina Content API provides a GraphQL interface to your repositories files where content is stored in open formats like Markdown and JSON, allowing for easy content re-use and migrations.

items.headline: Robust Content Models
items.subline: Tina promotes a document-oriented approach to content models. This means repeatable or nested structures like blocks can be stored with the pageâ€™s complete data, resulting in more straightforward content queries and operations.

blocks.headline: *Edit Content, Not Code*
blocks.subline: Make changes in contenxt and see them in in real time. Hit save and Tina handles the commit.
